name: iTop - Run CRON
description:
Run iTop CRON job to execute background tasks such as sending notifications, performing backups, ...
_Note: If your iTop isn't listed, try to change the scan max depth, but mind that it will impact the page loading time._

parameters.name: iTop instance
parameters.description: iTop instance you want to run the CRON for

parameters.name: Auth. user
parameters.description: iTop user login to execute the CRON

parameters.name: Auth. password
parameters.description: iTop user password to execute the CRON

parameters.name: PHP version
parameters.description: PHP version to run the CRON with (ensure to select one that is compatible with the selected iTop instance)

parameters.name: Verbose
parameters.description: If set to true, the CRON will output detailed information about its tasks, execution times, and any issues encountered
